statements: SELECT * FROM allele_frequencies WHERE generation = 1;
SELECT generation, alleleA_frequency FROM allele_frequencies WHERE alleleA_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT alleleA_frequency, alleleB_frequency FROM allele_frequencies WHERE generation = 2 ORDER BY alleleA_frequency DESC;
SELECT generation, SUM(alleleA_frequency) AS total_alleleA_frequency FROM allele_frequencies GROUP BY generation;
SELECT AVG(alleleA_frequency) AS avg_alleleA_frequency, AVG(alleleB_frequency) AS avg_alleleB_frequency FROM allele_frequencies;
SELECT generation, alleleA_frequency, alleleB_frequency FROM allele_frequencies WHERE generation > 5 ORDER BY alleleA_frequency DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT alleleA_frequency, alleleB_frequency FROM allele_frequencies WHERE generation < 10 ORDER BY generation ASC;
SELECT * FROM allele_frequencies WHERE generation >= 3 AND generation <= 7 ORDER BY generation DESC, alleleA_frequency ASC;
SELECT generation, alleleA_frequency FROM allele_frequencies WHERE alleleB_frequency > 0.5 ORDER BY alleleA_frequency DESC;
SELECT generation, alleleA_frequency, alleleB_frequency FROM allele_frequencies WHERE generation % 2 = 0 ORDER BY generation ASC, alleleA_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM Generation;
SELECT generation_id, population_size FROM Generation WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT allele_name, frequency FROM Allele WHERE generation_id = 5 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT AVG(avg_allele_frequency) AS avg_allele_freq FROM Generation;
SELECT * FROM Generation INNER JOIN Allele ON Generation.generation_id=Allele.generation_id;
SELECT * FROM Generation ORDER BY generation_id DESC
SELECT generation_id, population_size FROM Generation WHERE avg_allele_frequency > 0.5
SELECT COUNT(generation_id) AS total_generations FROM Generation
SELECT allele_name, frequency FROM Allele WHERE generation_id = 2 ORDER BY frequency DESC
SELECT AVG(frequency) AS avg_frequency FROM Allele
SELECT * FROM allele_frequencies ORDER BY generation_number DESC;
SELECT allele_name, frequency FROM allele_frequencies WHERE generation_number = 10;
SELECT * FROM population WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT population_name, total_alleles FROM population ORDER BY total_alleles ASC;
SELECT change_description FROM generation_changes WHERE affected_alleles > 50;

SELECT p.population_id, p.population_name, COUNT(af.allele_id) AS total_alleles FROM population p LEFT JOIN allele_frequencies af ON p.population_id = af.allele_id GROUP BY p.population_id, p.population_name
SELECT af.allele_id, af.allele_name, af.frequency, p.population_name FROM allele_frequencies af INNER JOIN population p ON af.allele_id = p.population_id ORDER BY af.frequency DESC
SELECT p.population_name, COUNT(g.change_id) AS total_changes FROM population p LEFT JOIN generation_changes g ON p.population_id = g.change_id GROUP BY p.population_name

SELECT af.allele_name, p.population_name, g.change_description FROM allele_frequencies af INNER JOIN population p ON af.allele_id = p.population_id INNER JOIN generation_changes g ON af.generation_number = g.generation_number WHERE g.affected_alleles > 10

SELECT p.population_id, p.creation_date, SUM(af.frequency) AS total_frequency FROM population p INNER JOIN allele_frequencies af ON p.population_id = af.allele_id GROUP BY p.population_id, p.creation_date
SELECT * FROM AlleleFrequencyGenerations
SELECT generation_id, allele_A_frequency, allele_B_frequency FROM AlleleFrequencyGenerations
SELECT population_id, population_name FROM PopulationDetails ORDER BY population_name DESC
SELECT * FROM MutationEvents WHERE event_type = 'insert'
SELECT generation_id, mean_allele_frequency FROM GenerationStatistics WHERE mean_allele_frequency > 0.5
SELECT * FROM AlleleFrequencyGenerations
SELECT generation_id, allele_A_frequency, allele_B_frequency FROM AlleleFrequencyGenerations ORDER BY generation_id DESC
SELECT population_name, population_size FROM PopulationDetails WHERE population_size > 100
SELECT * FROM MutationEvents WHERE event_type = 'Insertion'
SELECT generation_id, mean_allele_frequency FROM GenerationStatistics WHERE mean_allele_frequency > 0.5 ORDER BY mean_allele_frequency ASC
SELECT * FROM Generation ORDER BY generation_id DESC;
SELECT population_name, region FROM Population WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT allele_name FROM Allele WHERE allele_name LIKE '%A';
SELECT population_name, COUNT(*) FROM Population GROUP BY population_name;
SELECT generation_id, frequency FROM AlleleFrequency WHERE generation_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Generation ORDER BY generation_id DESC, population_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT population_name, region FROM Population WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT allele_name, allele_id FROM Allele WHERE allele_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY allele_id ASC;
SELECT generation_id, AVG(allele_frequency) AS average_frequency FROM Generation GROUP BY generation_id HAVING AVG(allele_frequency) > 0.5;
SELECT g.generation_id, c.description FROM Generation g INNER JOIN ChangeLog c ON g.generation_id = c.generation_id WHERE g.population_id = 3;
